name: Project: Rynth
description:
Hope you all enjoy the alpha demo! The rules are simple; trigger all of the touch-sensitive floors in the maze to beat the game, and keep your wits about you to survive...

Controls will be added into the alpha demo shortly, but here they are for now;

  • Mouse - Look Around
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Left Mouse - Toggle Flashlight
  • Right Mouse (Hold) - Focus
  • Shift / Middle Mouse (Hold) - Run

Please leave feedback, whether it be good, bad or a mixture of both! Many thanks!!!
